feature.label: KNIME Tableau Extract API 2.0 (Hyper) Platform specific packages
feature.description: Tableau Extract API 2.0 (Hyper) binaries for Linux, Mac and Windows. These binaries are required for the KNIME Tableau (Hyper) nodes.
feature.copyright: Copyright by KNIME AG, Zurich, Switzerland
